DOC.brief_summary: This qualitative interview-based study investigate impact live congenital adrenal hyperplasia woman follow area : health-related quality life ( HRQL ) , psychological health , health-seeking behavior .
DOC.brief_title: Qualitative Research Women With Congenital Adrenal Hyperplasia
DOC.detailed_description: Congenital Adrenal Hyperplasia chronic-illness require life-long treatment cause inherited enzyme deficiency lead overproduction hormone produce adrenal gland , turn , masculinize female genitalia birth . While mechanisms CAH influence physiological development understood , impact hormonal elevation health-related quality life ( HRQL ) , psychological health , health-seeking behavior less clear . This study guide three research question : ( 1 ) CAH influence HRQL domains ( physical , functional , emotional interpersonally ) , ( 2 ) CAH influence mental health woman diagnose CAH , ( 3 ) CAH influence decision seek help counselor ? Semi-structured qualitative interview conduct woman CAH . Interviews analyze Consensual Qualitative Research ( CQR ) methodology .
DOC.criteria: 46XX , Females Diagnosed physician CAH ( either simplevirilizing saltlosing type ) Willing complete brief demographic questionnaire participate hour long telephone interview Nonclassical lateonset CAH
